name: Connect Candy Adventure- Match 3 Mania
description:
Connect Candy Adventure is a very addictive connect lines puzzle game!
Connect colorful lines of candies to solve compelling levels in this puzzle adventure!
Connect Candy Adventure Features:
- Colorful and sweet candies.
- Easy to learn, hard to master.
- Reward players with many props.
- Leaderboards in friends circle and world.
- Two play mode: puzzle and arcade.
